(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NNS Results))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (DT the) (NN Meat) (NNS polls))))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (PP (IN in)))
    (. !)))


det(Results-2, The-1)
nsubj(are-7, Results-2)
prep(Results-2, of-3)
det(polls-6, the-4)
nn(polls-6, Meat-5)
pobj(of-3, polls-6)
root(ROOT-0, are-7)
prep(are-7, in-8)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNS Thanks))
    (PP (TO to)
      (NP
        (NP (DT all) (NNS voters))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP who))
          (S
            (VP (VBN polled))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Thanks-1)
prep(Thanks-1, to-2)
det(voters-4, all-3)
pobj(to-2, voters-4)
nsubj(polled-6, who-5)
rcmod(voters-4, polled-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ seems)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NNS readers))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (DT this) (NN blog))))
          (VP (VBP are)
            (VP (VBN kindred)
              (NP
                (NP (NNS spirits))
                (PP (IN with)
                  (NP (PRP myself)))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WP$ whose) (JJ favorite) (NNS meat))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBZ is)
                      (VP (VBG Beef)
                        (NP (CD 29) (NN %))))))))))))))


nsubj(seems-2, It-1)
root(ROOT-0, seems-2)
mark(kindred-10, that-3)
det(readers-5, the-4)
nsubjpass(kindred-10, readers-5)
prep(readers-5, of-6)
det(blog-8, this-7)
pobj(of-6, blog-8)
auxpass(kindred-10, are-9)
ccomp(seems-2, kindred-10)
dobj(kindred-10, spirits-11)
prep(spirits-11, with-12)
pobj(with-12, myself-13)
poss(meat-16, whose-14)
amod(meat-16, favorite-15)
nsubj(Beef-18, meat-16)
aux(Beef-18, is-17)
rcmod(spirits-11, Beef-18)
num(%-20, 29-19)
dobj(Beef-18, %-20)


(ROOT
  (INTJ (UH .)))




(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (NNP Chicken)
        (CC and)
        (NNP Fish))
      (VP (VBD were)
        (ADJP (RB quite) (JJ close))))
    (CC but)
    (S
      (NP (NNP Chicken) (NNS people))
      (VP (VBD managed)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB hang)
              (PRT (RP on))
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP (DT the) (NN lead)))
              (SBAR (IN though)
                (S
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (NN Fish) (NNS Lovers))
                    (PP (IN at)
                      (NP (CD one) (NN stage))))
                  (VP (VBD looked)
                    (SBAR (RB as) (IN if)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP they))
                        (VP (MD might)
                          (VP (VB catch)
                            (PRT (RP up))
                            (PP (IN with)
                              (NP (DT the) (NNP Chicken) (NNS people)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(close-6, Chicken-1)
cc(Chicken-1, and-2)
conj(Chicken-1, Fish-3)
cop(close-6, were-4)
advmod(close-6, quite-5)
root(ROOT-0, close-6)
cc(close-6, but-7)
nn(people-9, Chicken-8)
nsubj(managed-10, people-9)
conj(close-6, managed-10)
aux(hang-12, to-11)
xcomp(managed-10, hang-12)
prt(hang-12, on-13)
prep(hang-12, to-14)
det(lead-16, the-15)
pobj(to-14, lead-16)
mark(looked-24, though-17)
det(Lovers-20, the-18)
nn(Lovers-20, Fish-19)
nsubj(looked-24, Lovers-20)
prep(Lovers-20, at-21)
num(stage-23, one-22)
pobj(at-21, stage-23)
advcl(hang-12, looked-24)
advmod(catch-29, as-25)
mark(catch-29, if-26)
nsubj(catch-29, they-27)
aux(catch-29, might-28)
advcl(looked-24, catch-29)
prt(catch-29, up-30)
prep(catch-29, with-31)
det(people-34, the-32)
nn(people-34, Chicken-33)
pobj(with-31, people-34)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Pork))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP (JJ 4th) (NN position)))
      (PP
        (ADVP (RB presumably))
        (IN because) (IN of)
        (NP (DT some) (JJ dietary) (NNS restrictions)))
      (PP (IN amongst)
        (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ Muslim) (NNS readers))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(was-2, Pork-1)
root(ROOT-0, was-2)
prep(was-2, in-3)
amod(position-5, 4th-4)
pobj(in-3, position-5)
advmod(of-8, presumably-6)
mwe(of-8, because-7)
prep(was-2, of-8)
det(restrictions-11, some-9)
amod(restrictions-11, dietary-10)
pobj(of-8, restrictions-11)
prep(was-2, amongst-12)
poss(readers-15, our-13)
amod(readers-15, Muslim-14)
pobj(amongst-12, readers-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (VP (VBN amazed)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP we))
            (VP (VBP have)
              (NP
                (NP
                  (QP (RB around) (CD 57))
                  (NNS vegetarians))
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP (PRP$ our) (NN midst)))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubjpass(amazed-3, I-1)
auxpass(amazed-3, am-2)
root(ROOT-0, amazed-3)
mark(have-6, that-4)
nsubj(have-6, we-5)
ccomp(amazed-3, have-6)
quantmod(57-8, around-7)
num(vegetarians-9, 57-8)
dobj(have-6, vegetarians-9)
prep(vegetarians-9, in-10)
poss(midst-12, our-11)
pobj(in-10, midst-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (PP (VBG Considering)
      (NP (DT that)))
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB only))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (NP
        (NP (RB so) (JJ few) (NNS posts))
        (PP (IN on)
          (NP (NN vegetarian) (NN food)))))
    (, ,)))


prep(have-5, Considering-1)
pobj(Considering-1, that-2)
nsubj(have-5, I-3)
advmod(have-5, only-4)
root(ROOT-0, have-5)
advmod(posts-8, so-6)
amod(posts-8, few-7)
dobj(have-5, posts-8)
prep(posts-8, on-9)
nn(food-11, vegetarian-10)
pobj(on-9, food-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT that))
    (VP (VBZ 's)
      (NP (PDT quite) (DT a) (NN number)))
    (. .)))

cop(number-5, 's-2)
predet(number-5, quite-3)
det(number-5, a-4)
root(ROOT-0, number-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Perhaps))
    (NP (PRP you))
    (ADVP (DT all))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB like)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB recommend)
              (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ favorite) (NN vegetarian) (NN food) (NNS places))
              (SBAR (RB so) (IN that)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP I))
                  (VP (MD can)
                    (VP (VB add)
                      (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (JJR more))
                      (PP (TO to)
                        (NP (DT the) (NN blog))))))))))))
    (. ?)))


advmod(like-5, Perhaps-1)
nsubj(like-5, you-2)
advmod(like-5, all-3)
aux(like-5, would-4)
root(ROOT-0, like-5)
aux(recommend-7, to-6)
xcomp(like-5, recommend-7)
poss(places-12, your-8)
amod(places-12, favorite-9)
nn(places-12, vegetarian-10)
nn(places-12, food-11)
dobj(recommend-7, places-12)
advmod(add-17, so-13)
mark(add-17, that-14)
nsubj(add-17, I-15)
aux(add-17, can-16)
advcl(recommend-7, add-17)
det(more-20, a-18)
amod(more-20, few-19)
dobj(add-17, more-20)
prep(add-17, to-21)
det(blog-23, the-22)
pobj(to-21, blog-23)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB Once) (RB again))
    (NP
      (NP (NNS thanks))
      (PP (IN for)
        (S
          (VP (VBG taking)
            (NP (NN part))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (DT the) (NNS polls)))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(again-2, Once-1)
dep(thanks-3, again-2)
root(ROOT-0, thanks-3)
prep(thanks-3, for-4)
pcomp(for-4, taking-5)
dobj(taking-5, part-6)
prep(taking-5, in-7)
det(polls-9, the-8)
pobj(in-7, polls-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (JJ next) (NN one))
    (VP (MD should)
      (VP (VB be)
        (VP (VBG coming)
          (ADVP (RB up) (RB later))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (DT the) (NN week))))))
    (. .)))


det(one-3, The-1)
amod(one-3, next-2)
nsubj(coming-6, one-3)
aux(coming-6, should-4)
aux(coming-6, be-5)
root(ROOT-0, coming-6)
advmod(later-8, up-7)
advmod(coming-6, later-8)
prep(coming-6, in-9)
det(week-11, the-10)
pobj(in-9, week-11)
